description:
Approach

After the rough dirt road approach you park at a bridge where you will make the first rappel.

Descent

The first section is visible from this bridge and is in the direct flow. After this section you will walk along the flat creek till the canyon enters another very nice slot section.

Exit

At the end of the canyon there is a rock slope with some large fossils on it. At this point find a trail on the left side of the canyon back up the hill through the forest. You will eventually be on a farm trail to the dirt road where several farmhouses are located. Make your way back up the road to your cars.

Red tape

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Highlight Video:


Trip Video:


Background

This canyon was discovered by David Ov, Pascal von Duin, and Canyoning Bob.
name: Sushices
